name: Just Fishing
description:
Game with stunning graphics, realistic physics and system behavior of the fish, a wide selection of fishing gear, change the time of day, weather conditions affecting the nibble fish, and many others. Tournaments and competitions, teams and ratings, everything you need for this PVP.
Join the ranks of fans of the game on Steam and fight within a single game universe where you are waiting for players from other platforms: Win and Mac OS X.

  • Dozens of beautiful locations.
  • Hundreds of different species of fish.
  • Complete interesting quests.
  • Visit the many stunning lakes and rivers.
  • Compete in tournaments and matches.
  • Create or join a team.
  • And fight with other players for the best places and prizes
